title: Did the volleyball team in high school receive the money and the new lime after the fire of Paradise?
subtitle: A team from the destroyed Paradise community found support as well as competition in an unforgettable watershed match.
author: Arturo Garcia
vclaim: The Adventist Academy of California received about $13,000 in donations as well as new uniforms and clothes from a foe in a game that was played shortly after their hometown was destroyed by the camp fire.
